TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumberSubstitution extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定如何用不同的区域性显示文本中的数字。

span.span: Specifies how numbers in text are displayed in different cultures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数区域性使用 decimal 系统来表示数字，但许多区域性使用不同的数字形状。Most cultures use the decimal system to represent numbers, but many cultures use different digit shapes. 下表显示了不同区域性使用的多个编号系统。The following table shows several numbering systems used by different cultures. ![数字备用标志符号表](~/add/media/numbersubstitution01.png "数字备用标志符号表")![Table of number substitution glyphs](~/add/media/numbersubstitution01.png "Table of number substitution glyphs") 不同区域性中的数字外观示例Example of the appearance of digits in different cultures 为每组数字形状提供备用的 Unicode 码位是不够的，因为与字母不同，在计算中使用数字。It is not sufficient to provide alternate Unicode code points for each set of digit shapes, because, unlike letters, digits are used in calculations. 每个应用程序、每个操作系统和每个运行时库都包含专用于将内部二进制格式数值转换为字符串的代码，反之亦然。Every application, every operating system, and every run-time library contains code dedicated to converting an internal binary format numeric value to a string of characters, and vice versa. 这些转换例程被编码为使用 Unicode 数字 "0030" 到 "0039"。These conversion routines are coded to use Unicode digits "0030" through "0039". 类提供允许不同区域性在呈现时替换适当的数字形状的功能。The class provides functionality that allows different cultures to substitute the appropriate digit shapes at rendering time. 此功能与用于提供字体替换和语言相关字体呈现的功能类似。This functionality is similar to the one used for providing font substitution and language dependent font rendering. > [!NOTE] > 许多区域性都放弃了其传统的数字形状，并采用了西方数字形状，因此，number 替换功能可识别传统数字形状和国家/地区标准数字形状之间的每个区域性的区别。Many cultures are discarding their traditional digits shapes and adopting Western digits shapes, therefore the number substitution functionality recognizes the distinction for each culture between traditional digit shapes and national standard digit shapes. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类型通常不在 XAML 中用作对象元素。This type is not typically used in XAML as an object element. 但是，该类型公开了多个附加属性，这些属性可以在具有文本内容的其他对象元素上进行设置。However, the type exposes several attached properties that can be set on other object elements that have text content.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识在 属性的值设置为 时要使用的区域性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which identifies which culture to use when the value of the property is set to .

value.span: 表示用作重写的区域性的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the culture that is used as an override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值 为 `null` ，它被解释为 "en-us" (美国英语) 区域性。The default value of the property is `null`, which is interpreted as the "en-us" (United States English) culture. 如果未 设置为 ，则忽略此属性。If is not set to , this property is ignored. 此引用页代表属性的两个名称相同但不完全等效的用法 ：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 可以在实例的代码中将此属性设置 为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 属性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a common language runtime (CLR) property. 在此用法中，属性不受依赖属性标识符的支持，它由私有字段支持，不作为依赖属性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 可以将此属性设置为 XAML 中的附加属性用法。You can set this property as an attached property usage in XAML. 附加属性用法是此属性具有依赖属性信息部分的原因，因为附加属性由依赖属性标识符提供支持。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在 xaml 中，用法是 `<` *对象* **system.windows.media.numbersubstitution.substitution。 system.windows.media.numbersubstitution.cultureoverride** `="` *值* `".../>` ，其中 *object* 是应用指定数字替换逻辑的对象元素，*值* 是字符串格式值之一，如 XAML 值中所述。In XAML, the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 在代码中，和支持附加的属性用法 。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *CultureInfo**CultureInfo* 值的字符串表示形式 。String representation of a value. 例如，字符串 "en-us" 表示美国英语区域性设置。For example, the string, "en-us", represents the United States English culture setting. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识用于确定数字替换的区域性值的源。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which identifies the source of the culture value that is used to determine number substitution.
An enumerated value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值 为 ，它是文本运行的区域性。The default value of the property is , which is the culture of the text run. 此引用页代表属性的两个名称相同但不完全等效的用法 ：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 可以在实例的代码中将此属性设置 为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 属性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a common language runtime (CLR) property. 在此用法中，属性不受依赖属性标识符的支持，它由私有字段支持，不作为依赖属性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 可以将此属性设置为 XAML 中的附加属性用法。You can set this property as an attached property usage in XAML. 附加属性用法是此属性具有依赖属性信息部分的原因，因为附加属性由依赖属性标识符提供支持。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在 XAML 中，用法是 `<` *对象* **system.windows.media.numbersubstitution.substitution. CultureSource** `="` *值* `".../>` ，其中 *object* 是应用指定数字替换逻辑的对象元素，*值* 是值的字符串表示形式 。In XAML, the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is a string representation of a value. 在代码中，和支持附加的属性用法 。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**=""/>\<*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**=""/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识用于确定数字替换的替换方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which identifies the substitution method that is used to determine number substitution.
An enumerated value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值 为，该值 指定替换方法应根据数字区域性的 属性值进行确定。The default value of the property is , which specifies that the substitution method should be determined based on the number culture's property value. 此引用页代表属性的两个名称相同但不完全等效的用法 ：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 可以在实例的代码中将此属性设置 为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 属性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a common language runtime (CLR) property. 在此用法中，属性不受依赖属性标识符的支持，它由私有字段支持，不作为依赖属性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 可以将此属性设置为 XAML 中的附加属性用法。You can set this property as an attached property usage in XAML. 附加属性用法是此属性具有依赖属性信息部分的原因，因为附加属性由依赖属性标识符提供支持。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在 XAML 中，用法是 `<` *对象* **system.windows.media.numbersubstitution.substitution** `="` `".../>` ，其中 *object* 是应用指定数字替换逻辑的对象元素，*值* 是值的字符串表示形式 。In XAML, the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is a string representation of a value. 在代码中，和支持附加的属性用法 。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**=""/>\<*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**=""/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
